#include "viewportrenderer.h"
#include <maya/MRenderingInfo.h>
#include <maya/MFnCamera.h>
#include <maya/MGlobal.h>
#include "beastwrappers/beastframebufferwrapper.h"

namespace beastmaya {

ViewportRenderer::ViewportRenderer(const MString& name) : 
                MViewportRenderer(name), 
                m_GLFT(NULL), 
                m_frameTexture(0),
                m_powLookup(12, 1.0f / 2.2f) {
        setUIName("Beast Renderer");
        setRenderingOverride(MViewportRenderer::kOverrideThenStandard);
        registerRenderer();
}


void ViewportRenderer::BeastViewportLiveJob::onUpdate(ILBUpdateType updateType) {
        switch (updateType) {
                case ILB_UT_UPDATE_CAMERA_FRAME_BUFFER:
                        int width, height;
                        ILBFramebufferHandle h;
                        BEAST_CALL(ILBGetUpdateFramebuffer(m_job->getUpdateHandle(), &h));
                        BeastFramebuffer beastBuffer(h, true);
                        beastBuffer.getResolution(width, height);
                        std::vector<float> framebuffer;
                        beastBuffer.readRegionHDR(0, 0, width, height, ILB_CS_RGB, framebuffer);
                        m_viewportRenderer.setFrameBufferData(framebuffer, width, height, 3); // Pretty sure it's three channels (RGB)
                        break;
        }
}

MStatus ViewportRenderer::render(const MRenderingInfo &renderInfo) {
        MFnCamera cam(renderInfo.cameraPath());
        if (cam.fullPathName() != "|persp|perspShape") {
                return MStatus::kSuccess;
        }

        if (m_framebufferData.size() == 0) {
                return MStatus::kSuccess;
        }
        
        const MRenderTarget& target = renderInfo.renderTarget();
        //target.makeTargetCurrent();
        int frameWidth = target.width();
        int frameHeight = target.height();

        if (renderInfo.renderingAPI() == MViewportRenderer::kOpenGL && m_GLFT != NULL) {
                m_fbLock.lock();
                if (m_framebufferUpdated) {
                        m_GLFT->glEnable(MGL_TEXTURE_2D);
                        m_GLFT->glBindTexture(MGL_TEXTURE_2D, m_frameTexture);
                        m_GLFT->glTexImage2D(MGL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, 4, m_framebufferWidth, m_framebufferHeight, 0, MGL_BGRA_EXT, MGL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, &m_framebufferData[0]);
                        m_GLFT->glTexParameteri(MGL_TEXTURE_2D, MGL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, MGL_LINEAR);
                        m_GLFT->glTexParameteri(MGL_TEXTURE_2D, MGL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, MGL_LINEAR);
                        m_GLFT->glTexParameteri(MGL_TEXTURE_2D, MGL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, MGL_CLAMP);
                        m_GLFT->glTexParameteri(MGL_TEXTURE_2D, MGL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, MGL_CLAMP);
                        m_framebufferUpdated = false;
                }
                m_fbLock.unlock();

                m_GLFT->glDisable(MGL_DEPTH_TEST);
                
                // Set projection matrix
                m_GLFT->glMatrixMode(MGL_PROJECTION);
                m_GLFT->glPushMatrix();
                m_GLFT->glLoadIdentity();

                // Set orthographic view matching the framebuffer to viewport
                double yscale = ((double)frameHeight / frameWidth) * ((double)m_framebufferWidth / m_framebufferHeight);
                m_GLFT->glOrtho(-1, 1, -yscale, yscale, -1, 1);

                // Set view projection
                m_GLFT->glMatrixMode(MGL_MODELVIEW);
                m_GLFT->glPushMatrix();
                m_GLFT->glLoadIdentity();

                // Draw
                m_GLFT->glEnable(MGL_TEXTURE_2D);
                m_GLFT->glBindTexture(MGL_TEXTURE_2D, m_frameTexture);
                m_GLFT->glCallList(m_frameList);

                // Reset
                m_GLFT->glMatrixMode(MGL_PROJECTION);
                m_GLFT->glPopMatrix();
                m_GLFT->glMatrixMode(MGL_MODELVIEW);
                m_GLFT->glPopMatrix();
                m_GLFT->glEnable(MGL_DEPTH_TEST);
                m_GLFT->glDisable(MGL_TEXTURE_2D);

        } else if (renderInfo.renderingAPI() == MViewportRenderer::kSoftware) {
                m_fbLock.lock();
                MImage resizedImage;
                resizedImage.create(m_framebufferWidth, m_framebufferHeight);
                resizedImage.setPixels(&m_framebufferData[0], m_framebufferWidth, m_framebufferHeight);
                m_framebufferUpdated = false;
                m_fbLock.unlock();

                int resizedHeight = frameWidth * m_framebufferHeight / m_framebufferWidth ;
                resizedImage.resize(frameWidth, resizedHeight, false);


                MImage croppedImage;
                int croppedHeight = std::min(frameHeight, resizedHeight);
                croppedImage.create(frameWidth, frameHeight);


                int ypeek = std::max((resizedHeight - frameHeight) / 2, 0) ;
                croppedImage.setPixels(resizedImage.pixels() + ypeek * frameWidth * 4, frameWidth, croppedHeight);


                int ypoke = std::max((frameHeight - croppedHeight) / 2, 0);
                target.writeColorBuffer(croppedImage, 0, ypoke);

                resizedImage.release();
                croppedImage.release();
        }

        return MStatus::kSuccess;
}


void ViewportRenderer::setFrameBufferData(const std::vector<unsigned char>& pixels, int width, int height, int channels) {

        m_fbLock.lock();

        m_framebufferData.resize(width*height*4);

        int destBufIndex = 0;
        int srcBufIndex = width * (height - 1) * channels;
        if (channels == 3) {
                for (int y = 0; y < height; y++) {
                        for (int x = 0; x < width; x++) {
                                const unsigned char r = pixels[srcBufIndex++];
                                const unsigned char g = pixels[srcBufIndex++];
                                const unsigned char b = pixels[srcBufIndex++];
                                m_framebufferData[destBufIndex++] = b;
                                m_framebufferData[destBufIndex++] = g;
                                m_framebufferData[destBufIndex++] = r;
                                m_framebufferData[destBufIndex++] = 255;
                        }
                        srcBufIndex -= 2 * width * channels;
                }
        }

        m_framebufferWidth = width;
        m_framebufferHeight = height;
        m_framebufferUpdated = true;
        m_fbLock.unlock();

        MStatus res = MGlobal::executeCommandOnIdle("refresh -f");
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
}

void ViewportRenderer::setFrameBufferData(const std::vector<float>& pixels, int width, int height, int channels) {

        m_fbLock.lock();

        m_framebufferData.resize(width*height*4);

        int destBufIndex = 0;
        int srcBufIndex = width * (height - 1) * channels;
        if (channels == 3) {
                for (int y = 0; y < height; y++) {
                        for (int x = 0; x < width; x++) {
                                const unsigned char r = m_powLookup.lookup(pixels[srcBufIndex++]);
                                const unsigned char g = m_powLookup.lookup(pixels[srcBufIndex++]);
                                const unsigned char b = m_powLookup.lookup(pixels[srcBufIndex++]);
                                m_framebufferData[destBufIndex++] = b;
                                m_framebufferData[destBufIndex++] = g;
                                m_framebufferData[destBufIndex++] = r;
                                m_framebufferData[destBufIndex++] = 255;
                        }
                        srcBufIndex -= 2 * width * channels;
                }
        }
        m_framebufferWidth = width;
        m_framebufferHeight = height;
        m_framebufferUpdated = true;
        m_fbLock.unlock();

        MStatus res = MGlobal::executeCommandOnIdle("refresh -f");
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
}
